content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, it's pleasure to meet you. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for a 25 square meter apartment that is in good condition and has good natural light. What is your proposed price?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I understand that you are looking for a 25 square meter apartment with good natural light. Based on the location and condition of the apartment, I propose a rental price of €600 per month. This price includes all utilities.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
600 Euro is a bit high for me. Can we negotiate?

I would be comfortable with a rental price of €500 - €550 per month.

If you can't match that price, I am willing to look for another apartment.

Please let me know.

Thank you.

Baihu Li

P.S. I would like to pay the rent in cash.

P.S. Can I ask you if there are any other apartments available in this building?
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your response, Baihu Li. I understand that €600 per month is a bit high for you, and I am willing to negotiate. Based on your proposed rental price of €500 - €550 per month, I would be able to accept that price. However, I must clarify that I cannot accept cash payments. I would require a bank transfer or credit card payment.

Regarding your question about other apartments in this building, I can confirm that there are no other apartments available at the moment. However, I suggest that you keep an eye on our website or contact us directly if you have any further inquiries.

Thank you for considering our apartment, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
